Html:
Forgive this if already discussed, but I haven't found it in the forums. Firstly, many thanks for the development of this tool, works a treat. Updating our Java install proved very simple with this, it just worked.

Long-term use of this vs. the size of the WSUS content store raises the question of precedence or supersedence of similar updates, and cleanup of expired/superseded updates. I haven't found anything in the instructions which talks about linking a newer update as superseding a previous one. Is this possible, or already configured & I've missed it?
It is on the page where you name your update.
